Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Insertional mutation by transposable element , L1 , in the DMD gene results in X - linked dilated cardiomyopathy .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| X-linked dilated cardiomyopathy |

Explanation:
The only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a disease is "X-linked dilated cardiomyopathy". The other entities, "Insertional mutation", "transposable element", and "L1", do not directly refer to diseases, but rather describe the cause of the disease mentioned.
